statements: SELECT * FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, company_name, marketing_campaign_id FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 1001 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, company_name FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM CRM_Marketing_Data ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE company_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, AVG(marketing_campaign_id) AS avg_campaign_id FROM CRM_Marketing_Data;
SELECT customer_id, company_name, last_interaction_date FROM CRM_Marketing_Data WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_automation WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_automation WHERE campaign_id > 3 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM crm_data JOIN marketing_automation ON customer_id = campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_automation WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT name, email FROM crm_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, phone FROM crm_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM crm_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, email, phone FROM crm_data WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, email, phone FROM crm_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM marketing_automation WHERE clicked = TRUE AND converted = FALSE;
SELECT id, email FROM crm_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MIN(sent_date) AS first_sent_date, MAX(sent_date) AS last_sent_date FROM marketing_automation;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, SUM(opened) AS total_opened FROM marketing_automation;
SELECT * FROM CRM_Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CRM_Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, email, phone_number FROM Marketing_Leads ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT company_name FROM Marketing_Leads WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Marketing_Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CRM_Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CRM_Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT lead_name, email, company_name FROM Marketing_Leads WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM CRM_Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Marketing_Campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM MarketingLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CRMContacts ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_status FROM MarketingLeads WHERE lead_source IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CRMContacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CRMContacts WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM MarketingLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' AND lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT lead_id, conversion_rate, revenue FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion_rate > 20 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
